tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE travel_inventory (
  package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_name VARCHAR(255),
  destination VARCHAR(255),
  availability BOOLEAN,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE availability (
    availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    available_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE package_deals (
	deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	deal_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	destination VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE availability (
	availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	deal_id INT NOT NULL,
	available_date DATE NOT NULL,
	available_seats INT NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES package_deals(deal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing (
	pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	deal_id INT NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	discount DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
	FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES package_deals(deal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE availability (
	availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	deal_id INT,
	date DATE,
	available_quantity INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES package_deals(deal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing (
	pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	deal_id INT,
	date DATE,
	price DECIMAL(10, 2),
	FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES package_deals(deal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agency_inventory (
	inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	agency_id INT,
	deal_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES travel_agencies(agency_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES package_deals(deal_id)
);
